name: Anubis
description: Anubis is average, and he performs well almost everywhere, but he is best in PVP and in the tower, and worst in Grim Surge.

skills.name: Featherfall Judgment
skills.description: Anubis drains the soul of the weakest enemy, stunning them for 2s and dealing DMG equal to 450% of ATK. If the target is defeated when the skill ends, Anubis restores 600 Energy.

upgrades.level3: Increases Anubis's ATK by 20% upon defeating a target. This boost lasts until the battle ends.
upgrades.level4: After defeating a target, Anubis restores 25% of his max HP.

skills.name: Underworld Soulfarer
skills.description: The first time an enemy's HP drops below 80% in a battle, Anubis fades into the void. He then appears behind that enemy, deals DMG equal to 240% of ATK, and stuns the target for 2s.

upgrades.level2: When dealing DMG, steals 150 Energy from the target.

skills.name: Mythic Embalmer
skills.description: Each time Anubis loses a total of 50% of his max HP, he becomes immune to DMG and untargetable for 3s. This effect can only trigger once every 10s.

upgrades.level2: Increases Anubis's ATK by 20% until the battle ends when triggered.
upgrades.level3: Increases Lifesteal by 20% until the battle ends when triggered.
upgrades.level4: Increases ATK by 30% and grants 30% Lifesteal when triggered. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

skills.name: Shadowy Was-Scepter
skills.description: Spins his scepter to attack nearby enemies, dealing DMG equal to 210% of ATK and reducing their healing effects by 50% for 5s.

upgrades.level4: DMG dealt increases to 260% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.281)

relic.name: Tomb Protector
relic.description: Increases DMG dealt by Featherfall Judgment by 30% to enemies with less than 50% HP.

upgrades.level2: Enemies cannot receive healing during Featherfall Judgment. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: If an enemy drops below 5% HP after taking DMG from Featherfall Judgment, it executes that enemy. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt by Featherfall Judgment by 50% to enemies with less than 50% HP. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
